Title: Kakyuusei 2: Hitomi no Naka no Shoujo-tachi
Description: [' Many people have fond memories of meeting a certain teenage boy in their younger years. However, their ages vary widely, and each remembers him as a teen. This story follows the intricate intertwining of their various stories and how this young man, who apparently lives outside of time, has affected each of them. ', '\n', '\n']
